meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Carol Golliher Nathan Fuller Dan Adkison Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6359.

td.p: Carol Golliher, a retired English professor from Victorville, California
Nathan Fuller, a rural letter carrier from Sharon, Wisconsin
Dan Adkison, a copy editor from Brooklyn, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $13,200)

tr.td: YO-YO MA
THE 50 STATES
THE MOST POPULAR NETFLIX MOVIES
OTHER USPS ABBREV.
CENTENARIANS
G TO H

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Before revealing the responses] This is a bit tricky, because way back then the Super Bowl was played much earlier than it is these days.)
NathanWho was Nixon?
$200
DanWho is LBJ?
$9,000
CarolWho is JFK?
$6,000
Lyndon B. Johnson')

tr.td: WHO WAS THE PRESIDENT WHEN...
The Jets beat the heavily favored Colts in Super Bowl III
Dan
Nathan
Carol
2-day champion: $31,800
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
Dan
Nathan
Carol

16 R
(including 2 DDs),
2 W

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
